channel.title: How to properly use "points"
channel.description: As we all know, the majority of servers use some kind of points system to obtain items, I don't want that exactly, I would rather most items be obtainable through the coin currency, but still have some use for the points system, so when the player votes/completes a slayer task/Pk's someone/etc.. and obtains points, he has something desirable to get using them, but the question is what.

item.title: How to properly use "points"
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Do it like PC points… A minigame where you can cash in the points for (100*p)*x, where p = player level, x = experience rate (or whatever the hell the PC formula is).

Read full topic

item.title: How to properly use "points"
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Just relate the shops to the points.

Slayer shops use slayer points.
Maybe a fire making shop (every like 1k fires lit is like 1 point or something)
Agility can be something similar to fire making and just have agility outfits that lower your weight in the shop.
That classic delta assault game where u get points per kill and there is like torso and other shit like that in it.

Just some ideas

Read full topic

item.title: How to properly use "points"
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

JavaTC:

How about some kind of ability? Like for 50000 points, you can get the ability to double the chance for rare godwars drops, or certain skills like fishing, farming, woodcutting give 2x the output of items (i.e 2 fish/logs at a time).

Nice idea!

Read full topic

item.title: How to properly use "points"
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I like the idea Java… Like for a certain amount of points you could cash in a time for double xp, or turn your points into xp even.

Read full topic
